title: Project Performance Intelligence for a National AEC Firm
body: Built a forecasting engine for a national AEC firm delivering 250+ projects annually. Improved margin-risk prediction by 6–8 weeks and gave leadership real-time visibility into sector-level cost and performance.

title: Tariff Risk Simulation for a Multi-Channel Retailer
body: Developed an enterprise tariff model for a national retailer, running 15+ trade scenarios to quantify exposure and protect 11–14% of at-risk margin across sourcing, logistics, and pricing.

title: Operational Intelligence for a Regional Services Operator
body: Analyzed 60,000+ work orders for a $40M operator and rebuilt its profitability architecture, reducing quoting time by 42% and stabilizing margins across business units.

title: Digital Transformation Blueprint for a Banking Institution
body: Mapped 120+ processes for a multi-billion-asset bank to identify high-ROI CRM and automation opportunities projected to reduce operational inefficiencies by 15–25%.

title: Exhibition Logistics Optimization for a National Cultural Institution
body: Built a optimization model for a museum network managing over 100 traveling exhibitions annually, reducing forecast error by 28% and identifying 12–18% savings in routing and resource allocation.

title: Enterprise Modernization for a Beverage Producer
body: We supported a $200M+ beverage producer in moving to an integrated CRM–ERP system, reducing reconciliation time by 35–45% and shaping the launch strategy for a new RTD product line.
